abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponent's Paralysis chance is halved. Self-unnerved Pok√©mon have their Opponent Paralysis increased to 50%.

abilities.name: Aura Surge
abilities.description: Raises the User's Attack stat by 1 stage when the opponent uses a Pins move. This effect lasts for a maximum of 3 / 5 changes. Decreases the User's Special Attack stat by 1 stage if the move used on the opponent is a Pins move.
